mapper.sql: u_id, u_name, u_loginpassword, u_nickname, u_phone, u_lastlogintime, u_registime, u_state, u_balance, u_principal, u_interest, u_address, u_idcard, u_paypassword, u_creditworth, u_realname, u_sex, u_realaddress
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from user
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into user (u_id, u_name, u_loginpassword, u_nickname, u_phone, u_lastlogintime, u_registime, u_state, u_balance, u_principal, u_interest, u_address, u_idcard, u_paypassword, u_creditworth, u_realname, u_sex, u_realaddress ) values (#{uId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{uName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{uLoginpassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{uNickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{uPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{uLastlogintime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{uRegistime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{uState,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{uBalance,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{uPrincipal,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{uInterest,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{uAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{uIdcard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{uPaypassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{uCreditworth,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{uRealname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{uSex,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{uRealaddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

mapper.update:
update user
u_id = #{record.uId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
u_name = #{record.uName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
u_loginpassword = #{record.uLoginpassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

u_realaddress = #{record.uRealaddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
